posts.post_content:
I sold twenty, tweaking prices a bit...

Going with the following pricing structure (which includes delivery):
1 card - $38
3 cards - $108 ($36/card)
6 cards - $210 ($35/card)
10 cards - $340 ($34/card)
15 cards - $495 ($33/card)
20 cards - $640 ($32/card)
